title: Python 3.7
body:
Summary

Freshly cloned develop branch throws errors on Python 3.7

### Expected Result

Packages being installed

### Actual Result

```
:~/Repos % git clone https://github.com/spack/spack.git
Cloning into 'spack'...
remote: Counting objects: 122158, done.
remote: Compressing objects: 100% (110/110), done.
remote: Total 122158 (delta 68), reused 80 (delta 24), pack-reused 122007
Receiving objects: 100% (122158/122158), 41.35 MiB | 2.62 MiB/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (59189/59189), done.
:~/Repos % cd spack/bin 
:~/Repos/spack/bin (develop=) % ./spack install libelf
==> Error: name 'AutotoolsPackage' is not defined
```

### Information on your system

```
Archlinux x64
:~/Repos/spack/bin (develop=) % python --version
Python 3.7.0
:~/Repos/spack/bin (develop=) % uname -a
Linux 4.17.12-pascal #1 SMP PREEMPT Sun Aug 5 15:51:19 UTC 2018 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```
### How To reproduce in a docker container

```
:~ # docker run -i base/archlinux bash 
pacman -Sy git python   
:: Synchronizing package databases...
[...]
Packages (7) libnsl-1.2.0-1  pcre2-10.31-1  perl-error-0.17026-2  perl-mailtools-2.20-2  perl-timedate-2.30-5  git-2.18.0-1  python-3.7.0-3

Total Download Size:    41.15 MiB
Total Installed Size:  182.78 MiB

:: Proceed with installation? [Y/n] 
[...]
git clone https://github.com/spack/spack.git
Cloning into 'spack'...
cd spack/bin
./spack install libelf
==> Error: name 'AutotoolsPackage' is not defined
```
